content.en: Energy prediction: Machine learning tools are being used to accurately estimate the energy performance of residential buildings, specifically the heating load and cooling load. Different algorithms, such as random forest and artificial neural network, are compared to determine which one performs better for predicting building energy consumption. Ensemble learning techniques are found to improve the accuracy of energy consumption prediction in residential buildings compared to traditional machine learning techniques. Overall, data-driven models and algorithms are proving to be more effective than engineering methods for predicting energy performance in buildings.
content.da: Energiforudsigelse: Maskinlæringsværktøjer bruges til nøjagtigt at estimere energiydelsen i beboelsesbygninger, specifikt varmebelastning og kølebelastning. Forskellige algoritmer, såsom random forest og kunstigt neuralt netværk, sammenlignes for at afgøre, hvilken der fungerer bedst til at forudsige bygningens energiforbrug. Ensemble-læringsmetoder viser sig at forbedre nøjagtigheden af energiforbrugsforudsigelsen i beboelsesbygninger sammenlignet med traditionelle maskinlæringsteknikker. Generelt viser datadrevne modeller og algoritmer sig at være mere effektive end ingeniørmetoder til forudsigelse af energiydelse i bygninger.
